attributes.action: Help make health professions aware of Oral Allergy  Syndrome symptoms.
attributes.additional_details: As a sufferer of Oral Allergy Syndrome I told my doctors for 10 years that I reacted to raw fruit and veg but I wasn't taken seriously. I suffered bullying because my mouth would itch and throat swell up. The reactions are due to tree nuts,pollen. I am asking people to sign so nobody else has to go through what I experienced. I fought for years to be believed now I'm on the way to recovery thanks to my dermatologist.
